Interface Moveable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BarbarianHorde, Creature, Fraction, Merchant, RomanLegion

    public interface Moveable
extends java.lang.Runnable
    An interface that allows implementing classes to move.
    Author:
    Carlos
